name: arcgis-ipywidgets
description: Parent package of all widgets bundled in the arcgis package. This includes the MapView 'map widget', and some future planned widgets (charts, etc.)
author: esri

scripts.build:map: cd ./arcgis-map-ipywidget && yarn run build:prod && cd .. && cpx "./arcgis-map-ipywidget/dist/*js*" "./dist/"
